thread.title: Dick Vitale’s call of Syracuse’s buzzer-beater win over Duke has all the March Madness feels
thread.title_full: Dick Vitale’s call of Syracuse’s buzzer-beater win over Duke has all the March Madness feels

author: Sara Harris (sharris@sportingnews.com)
title: Dick Vitale’s call of Syracuse’s buzzer-beater win over Duke has all the March Madness feels
text:
February 23, 2017 8:32am EST February 23, 2017 8:26am EST Syracuse's thrilling buzzer-beater win over No. 11 Duke on Wednesday delivered feelings usually reserved for the NCAA Tournament. (Getty Images) 
Updated at 8:32 a.m. ET 
Updated at 8:32 a.m. ET 
Syracuse's thrilling buzzer-beater win over No. 11 Duke on Wednesday delivered feelings usually reserved for the NCAA Tournament. 
Check out ESPN's Dick Vitale's "Are you serious" call as John Gillon drained a 3-pointer as time expired: John Gillon wins it at the buzzer for Cuse! #DUKEvsCUSE pic.twitter.com/MEW1SrkB3a
